text: Dalip Tahil (born Dalip Tahilramani; 30 October 1952) is an Indian actor. Tahil is best known for his work in Qayamat Se Qayamat Tak (1988), Baazigar (1993), Hum hai rahi pyar ke (1993) and Raja (1995).This is how Dalip Tahil entered Bollywood films He studied at Sherwood College in Nainital, India. After attending Aligarh Muslim University for a year, he graduated from St. Xavier's College, Mumbai. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian stage actors Category:Indian voice actors Category:Actors from Uttar Pradesh
title: Dalip Tahil
